attributes.action: Do Not Make Covid-19 Vaccines Mandatory in Any Industry Including Healthcare
attributes.additional_details: Mandatory vaccines go against many human rights and the Nuremburg Code. Are the government happy to lose professionals who could potentially save people's lives just because they're enforcing a vaccine? Why are we losing human rights. Why do you want people out of work? You must stop this and allow freedom of choice. No vaccine should be mandatory.
attributes.background: People should not be losing their jobs over the Covid-19 vaccine. No vaccine has ever been mandatory and this shouldn't be either. We will lose many professionals in many industries with this mandatory vaccine. I would rather be treated by someone unvaccinated than no one at all.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872

Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
